title: @Riot A more "custom" Custom games?

embed.description: @Riot Custom games suck. Introducing Custom Games 2.0 General Discussion

body:
http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1583762

Pretty much describes my question. Was going to make a long(ish) post about it, but it seems to be done already.

The point is, will Riot bring out a better sort of custom games? If not, why not? It seemed to gain a tonne of attention and positive feedback on that thread, so why not implement it?
